feed.title: little pig
feed.subtitle: Self-discipline, in order to the People who love you, also for yourself!

entry.title: Cereals Brain
entry.summary: In order to stay away from the disease, we follow the so-called healthy diet to consume a lot of gluten and carbohydrates. However, brain and body diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, epilepsy, and anxiety are still raging. Why does this happen?
entry.content: In order to stay away from the disease, we follow the so-called healthy diet to consume a lot of gluten and carbohydrates. However, brain and body diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, epilepsy, and anxiety are still raging. Why does this happen?

entry.title: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github
entry.summary: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github. I know this thing after one day. When I hear about this, I'm shocked. When people do something like this, either this is a problem with the people's character, or this is a problem with the company. In either case, the ultimate winner of this event is Github. Like 996.icu.
